physical_appearance: "The image shows a button. It is circular in shape and it is dull gold in colour. The image of Queen Victoria is carved in the middle of the button's face. ""Victoria Dei Gratia"" is stated on the face of the button
subject_terms_1: around the image of Queen Victoria. There is a ringed arch attached to the centre of the button."
subject_terms_2: queens (people) Victoria, Queen of Great Britain, 1819-1901
